SEARCH
Package com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.BaseController<Recipe,RecipeRepository,RecipeDTO,RecipeService>
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.RecipeController
@Controller @RequestMapping(path="/api/v1/recipe") public class RecipeController extends BaseController<Recipe,RecipeRepository,RecipeDTO,RecipeService>
Controller for managing HTTP requests related to Recipe entities. Inherits from BaseController to provide common CRUD operations for Recipe entities and extends functionality to include searching by output product name and retrieving by output product ID. Leverages RecipeService for business logic and data persistence.

  • Constructor Details

    • RecipeController

      @Autowired public RecipeController(RecipeService service)
      Autowired constructor to inject RecipeService into this controller. Utilizes the injected service to handle business logic associated with recipes.
      Parameters:
      service - The RecipeService instance for managing recipes.

  • Method Details

    • getEntities

      @GetMapping(value="/find", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public List<Recipe> getEntities(@RequestParam String outputName)
      Retrieves a list of recipes whose output product's name contains the specified substring. This method facilitates the search functionality, allowing users to find recipes based on partial names of the output product.
      Parameters:
      outputName - The substring to search for within the output product's name.
      Returns:
      A list of recipes that match the search criteria.

    • getEntity

      @GetMapping(path="/output/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Optional<Recipe> getEntity(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Retrieves a specific recipe based on the output product's UUID. This endpoint allows for direct lookup of a recipe by associating it with the unique identifier of its output product.
      Overrides:
      getEntity in class BaseController<Recipe,RecipeRepository,RecipeDTO,RecipeService>
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the output product.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found recipe if available, or empty otherwise.
